attributes.action: Restore Hounslow Borough black bin waste collection to once every week
attributes.additional_details: Weekly bin collections are not a luxury for many residents of the Hounslow Borough, they are an essential service. The change to collect recycling and food waste bins weekly but move general waste collection to every 2 weeks is unacceptable. Councils who move to fortnightly collections see overflowing bins, more litter and more fly tipping. Please invest in our waste collection services, look after the people who deliver these services and restore our weekly bin collections.
attributes.background: Councils who move to fortnightly collections see overflowing bins, more litter and more fly tipping. Please invest in our waste collection services, look after the people who deliver these services and restore our weekly bin collections in The Hounslow Borough.

rejection.details: You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
